public class Java9 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int number=5;
		if(number == 1) {
			System.out.println("good");
		}
			else if(number==2) {
			System.out.println("better");
			}
			else if(number==3) {
			System.out.println("best");
			}
			else {
			System.out.println("invalid");

	}
	}
}
